content: **crochet drops head band in snow and knitted scarf in puddel ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see the knitted scarf pattern here 1 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **head band** **size** one-size circumference approx 46 cm / 18 width approx 11 cm / 4 3/8 **materials** drops snow from garnstudio 100 g color no 14 slate grey or color no 07 orange drops crochet hook size 8 mm / us l/11 - or crochet hook size needed to obtain correct gauge 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/104-20-b---knitted-scarf
